name: 基礎量子力學（二）
description: 介紹量子力學的基本原理、觀念、計算方法和主要應用，使學生更深入了解近代物理。
goals: 了解量子力學的基本原理、觀念
syllabus:
CH7 Harmonic Oscillator: 3 (3) weeks  9 Hrs

1\. Quantization of the Oscillator in Coordinate Basis

2\. Quantization of the Oscillator in Energy Basis

3\. Passage from the Energy Basis to the X Basis

CH9 Heisenberg Uncertainty Relations: 1(4) weeks 3Hrs

4\. Derivation and Application of Uncertainty Relations

CH11 Symmetries and Their Consequences: 1(5) week 3hrs

5\. Invariances in Quantum Theory

CH12 Rotational Invariance and Angular Momentum: 4 (9)weeks 12hrs

6\. Rotations in Two Dimensions

7\. The Eigenvalue Problem of LZ

8\. Angular Momentum in Three Dimensions

9\. Midterm Examination

CH13 The Hydrogen Atom: 2 (11) weeks 6Hrs

10\. The Eigenvalue Problem

11\. The Degeneracy of the Hydrogen Spectrum  Multielectron Atoms and the Periodic Table

CH14 Spin: 2 (13) weeks 6Hrs

12\. Kinematics of Spin

13\. Spin Dynamics

CH17 Time-Independent Perturbation: 2 (15) weeks 6Hrs

14\. The Formulism

15\. Some Examples

CH18 Time-Dependent Perturbation: 3 (18) weeks 6Hrs

16\. The Problem

17\. First-Order Perturbation Theory

18.  Final Examination

methodologies.note: 挑選重要基礎主題講授
